descriptionlist.description:
To call Nougat, just swipe to bring up the Action Center as usual.
Tweak features: • Status bar: Easily view the current date and time, as well as the charge level. • Brightness: Easily adjust the brightness level of your device. • Buttons: Customizable buttons to control the device. • Notification Center: Notifications will be available under the main Nougat panel, and a music player is also available..
